Ipswich Mobile Library Route 10

Contact us:

Managers: Andrew Little and David Cook

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Route 10 Town/village Location Time
MIP/10A Rushmere St. Andrew Claverton Way 0925 – 0940
MIP/10B Rushmere St. Andrew Bixley Drive 0945 – 1000
MIP/10C Rushmere St. Andrew Broadlands Way 1005 – 1030
MIP/10D Rushmere St. Andrew Foxhall Road, Heathlands Park 1035 – 1055
MIP/10E Ipswich Penshurst Road 1100 – 1200
MIP/10F Rushmere St. Andrew Bucklesham Road 1210 – 1220
MIP/10G Martlesham Angela Close 1335 – 1350
MIP/10H Martlesham Redwold Close 1355 – 1410
MIP/10I Martlesham Falcon Mobile Home Park 1420 – 1450
MIP/10J Martlesham Heath Douglas Bader 1500 – 1630

Calling every 4 weeks on Tuesdays:

2016: 26 January, 23 February, 22 March, 19 April, 17 May, 14 June, 12 July, 9 August, 6 September, 4 October, 1 November, 29 November, December (no visit)

2017: 24 January
